content:
From: "Jens-D. Doll" <jd@cococo.de>
Good morning,

after defending from several attacks here locally I'm back and will soon
continue the work on the Isabelle interface to/from my software.
Meanwhile I replaced a very slow component from Microsoft by a faster
one and published the new

Elbe 1.69

source navigator. The icon contains more blue color now instead of grey
and some bugs have been removed.

Happy reasoning,
Jens
